content: *fun for halloween or all year round this soft monster toy is great for children or the young at heart lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70445ad skill level beginner wool-ease® article #620 3 colors 1 ball each *lemongrass black sienna* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm polyester fiberfill some construction required to finish see also 70446ad pumpkin pal 1 *lion brand yarns requires free registration and log-in to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pumpkin-pal
